statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.10} per pound with some Kona coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.80} per pound to create \displaystyle{10} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${13.26} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
